author: dlr
msg: On the merge-tracking branch: Fix invocation of
svn_ra_get_merge_info() to use the revision number of the 'merge'
target (rather than the repository's youngest revision), and refactor
retrieval of merge info for said target into a helper function.
(parse_merge_info): Add an ENTRY parameter, and remove internal
retreival and error checking of the entry.
(get_wc_target_merge_info): New helper routine which retrieves any
inherited or direct merge info for the target from both the repos
and the WC's merge info prop, combines them, and returns the
combined value.  Pass the WC target's revision to

author: dlr
msg: On the merge-tracking branch: Fix compiler error for Visual C++ 6 due

msg: A follow-up to r20834 adjusting whitespace.
